ValidationRule.description: Prevents user from progressing past Develop if no products have been added to a quote. Standard Direct Opportunity only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OpportunityRTDirectStandard, !$Setup.cs_Apex_Settings__c.Bypass_All_Validations__c , NOT ( OR ( ISCHANGED ( Is_Updated_By_System__c ), Is_Updated_By_System__c = true, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileSystemAdmin, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileDataSteward ) ) ), AND ( NOT ( OR ( ISPICKVAL ( StageName, 'Closed Lost' ), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE ( StageName ) ,'Closed Lost' ), ISPICKVAL ( StageName, 'Closed Abandoned' ), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE ( StageName ) ,'Closed Abandoned' ), ISPICKVAL ( StageName, 'Create' ), ISPICKVAL ( StageName, 'Qualify' ), ISPICKVAL ( StageName, 'Develop' ), TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon ) ), Are_Products_Added__c = false, AND ( TEXT ( Account.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Account.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Distributor__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Distributor__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Lessor_Customer__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Lessor_Customer__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete ) ), false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add products to the opportunity (start by clicking "Create Quote/Proposal" button).
